summary: This document is a subpoena issued by the State Attorney's Office in Palm Beach County, Florida, commanding compliance from Cingular Wireless for subscriber information related to specific phone numbers. It emphasizes the importance of confidentiality regarding the investigation and outlines the consequences of non-compliance.

persons.name: Joe Recarey
persons.context: Detective Joe Recarey is mentioned as the issuing officer of the subpoena, responsible for overseeing the investigation.

persons.name: Sharon Lyn Scan
persons.context: Sharon Lyn Scan is noted as the notary public who witnessed the signing of the subpoena.

persons.name: Sharon Clerk
persons.context: Sharon Clerk is mentioned as the Assistant State Attorney involved in the issuance of the subpoena.

connections.description: Detective Joe Recarey works under the jurisdiction of the State Attorney's Office, where Sharon Clerk serves as an Assistant State Attorney.

events.title: Issuance of Subpoena
events.description: A subpoena was issued to Cingular Wireless for subscriber information related to specific phone numbers as part of an ongoing investigation.

locations: 345 South County Road, Palm Beach, FL 33480
401 North Dixie Highway, West Palm Beach, FL 33401
801 Northpoint Parkway, West Palm Beach, FL 33407
keyFacts: The subpoena commands Cingular Wireless to provide subscriber information for specific phone numbers.
The document emphasizes the confidentiality of the investigation and prohibits disclosure of the subpoena's existence.
Failure to comply with the subpoena may result in contempt of court charges.
